element-citation.article-title: Plant extracts for the control of bacterial growth: efficacy, stability and safety issues for food application

ref.mixed-citation: Negi, P.S., Plant extracts for the control of bacterial growth: efficacy, stability and safety issues for food application. Int J Food Microbiol, 2012. 156(1): p. 7-17, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijfoodmicro.2012.03.006.
